//notes: the dimensions-reference cheek pad is clearly a different model, but we use it for reference all the same because it's closer to being accurate than other options
//TODO: only allow mounting on solid stocks
description: A neoprene cover for most one-piece rifle or shotgun stocks.  It adds a padded cushion to the top of the stock, where your cheek would rest during aiming, providing comfort and relief from recoil, in effect improving your aim.

variants.description: A padded neoprene cheek rest.  Can mount onto any stock using adjustable nylon straps.  <variant:black>

//material: materials are a guess based on visual appearance
leather is probably of the faux variety, which isn't represented i in the game currently (0.H)
